Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Snow over southern sections this afternoon. Amount 5 cm over southern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
